about_the_game:
A card game with a focus on Monopoly gameplay, which can be played as a single player or multiplayer game on a single device, or online. The game features card collection, battle games, and some pigeon gameplay,It is a very fun game that is essential for home travel.

In the magical background of the game, the calm world welcomes five factions: Doomext, Mystarc, Spawken, Laword, and Anarchaos. Demons between the factions restrain each other, and with the addition of the world's Realmist earthly factions, various forces compete on this continent.
In the game, cards are divided into three categories: monster cards, prop cards, and battle cards. Monster cards are responsible for occupying territory and attacking each other, prop cards are used on traditional maps, and battle cards are used as auxiliary cards in battles. Various card combinations are used to communicate with friends in a friendly manner in the game.
